title: Help identifying odd modern typeface
content:
hi,

can anyone ID this font in this poster?

thanks, ed

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820082729im_/http:/typophile.com/files/mg_3379_4524.jpg)
author: Coldbaths

comments.content:
Diamonds is in the same vein but not matching. More suggestions for similars: [http://typophile.com/node/101210#comment-546276](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820082729/http:/typophile.com/node/101210#comment-546276 "http://typophile.com/node/101210#comment-546276")  
BTW, the other one on this poster "Event Shoppinghour Magazine..." is [P22 Underground](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820082729/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/p22/underground-basic).
